flocksimulator.domain

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • flocksimulator.domain.Agent
      • flocksimulator.domain.Flocker
        • flocksimulator.domain.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends Flocker
    Implementation of an agent with flocking behavior, but the appearance of a "particle/molecule"
    Author:
    peje
